contents: Article 23 (Execution of Business) In addition to matters stipulated in the Enforcement Decree of the Foundation Act, the Enforcement Decree of the Act such as the Special Act on Student Loan Repayment after Employment (hereinafter referred to as *Special Act), and the Articles of Incorporation, matters necessary for carrying out the Foundation's business are handled by the Board of Directors. decide Revised 2019. 7. 11.
